alert.note: Alert for Boyd; Brown; Eastern Cherry; Holt; Keya Paha; Rock; Sheridan; Western Cherry (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 14 at 3:25AM CST until December 15 at 9:00PM CST by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM CST /8 AM MST/ TO 9 PM CST /8 PM MST/ WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...West winds becoming northwest 25 to 35 mph with gusts to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...Sheridan, Eastern Cherry, Keya Paha, Boyd, Brown, Rock, Holt and Western Cherry Counties. * WHEN...From 9 AM CST /8 AM MST/ to 9 PM CST /8 PM MST/ Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Trucks may be blown over. Holiday decorations will be damaged or blown away. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Visibility may be reduced by blowing dust. A period of snow squalls is also possible late Wednesday afternoon.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Boyd; Brown; Eastern Cherry; Holt; Keya Paha; Rock; Sheridan; Western Cherry
